definitions.title: n.f. verbal.
definitions.body: a collecting, gathering; [[אַסִּיר]] ´[[אֻסְּפוּ א]] Is 24:22 they are collected, as a collecting captives unto a pit (dungeon); or they are gathered with a gathering (as) captives, cf. Is 22:18; but perh. rd. [[אׂסֶף הָאַסִּיר]] (cstr.); v. Weir Che.
